${ModID}:BackpackSmack.NAME: Backpack Smack
${ModID}:BackpackSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your draw pile contains 10 or more cards, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:BoosterTutor.NAME: Booster Tutor
${ModID}:BoosterTutor.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from different Packs in your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:DestinyDraw.NAME: Destiny Draw
${ModID}:DestinyDraw.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Packs. NL Gain a random card from the chosen Pack. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Flick.NAME: Flick
${ModID}:Flick.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Deal !D! damage a number of times equal to that card's energy cost.

${ModID}:MayhemForm.NAME: Mayhem Form
${ModID}:MayhemForm.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 fewer card per turn. NL At the start of your turn, choose a card from the top 3 in your draw pile and play it.
${ModID}:MayhemForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose a card from the top 3 in your draw pile and play it.

${ModID}:PackRip.NAME: Pack Rip
${ModID}:PackRip.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then choose 1 of 3 Packs. Add its cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PackRip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then choose 1 of 3 Packs. Add its cards to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RippedPecs.NAME: Ripped Pecs
${ModID}:RippedPecs.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each pack you've played a card from this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RippedPecs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each pack you've played a card from this combat.

${ModID}:Showoff.NAME: Showoff
${ModID}:Showoff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

${ModID}:Sideboard.NAME: Sideboard
${ModID}:Sideboard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SmithingHammer.NAME: Smithing Hammer
${ModID}:SmithingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:SmithingHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Upgrade !M! cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Synergize.NAME: Synergize
${ModID}:Synergize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the last card played was from a different Pack, gain !B! Block.
